system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefit

Reloading any shotgun with a magazine costs 2 Combat Points. Reloading any shotgun from loose rounds or refilling a magazine costs 1 Combat Points per round loaded. Once per turn, a character may load a shell directly into the barrel of a semi-automatic, pump, bolt, or lever action shotgun for no Combat Points, ejecting the chambered round on the ground.

Advanced Arms

Reloading a coolant pack into a Beamcaster costs 2 CP.
system.summary: 2 CP to reload shotgun mags, 1 CP for loose rounds, chamber swap
